snippet.title: Pathologic 2 - Gameplay Overview Trailer | May 23
snippet.description:
The Play Begins May 23

RSVP Your Seat on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/505230/Pathologic_2/

Pathologic 2 is a Narrative Driven Survival Thriller set in a world being consumed by a devastating plague.

#Pathologic2 #Pathologic #Plague
